nodes.text: A small cloning facility could be found next to the medical center in Nashal on the planet Talus at the time of the Galactic Civil War.

It was situated in a nondescript building. One room featured several beds for patients and a 2-1B surgical droid to treat them. The other room was below ground and contained the technology necessary to clone beings.
Durgur Pyne, the city's head of security, could often be found here.

The cloning facility is a place in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It provides players with a place to respawn ("clone") on Talus after they have been killed. The canonical status of such cloning facilities in Star Wars Galaxies is unknown.
The same type of building is used for many of the game's cloning facilities.
